definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: Zergling adrenal gland upgrade effects corrected.
sentences.chinese: 小狗肾上腺素的升级效果被修正了。

sentences.english: Hewas rushed to the hospital and injected with Adrenalin.
sentences.chinese: 他被急忙送往医院注射肾上腺素。

sentences.english: The adrenaline will keep you awake.
sentences.chinese: 肾上腺素会让你保持清醒状态哦。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effect of norepinephrine on cardiopulmonary resuscitation.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察去甲肾上腺素处理对心肺复苏的影响。

sentences.english: The adrenal gland dumps cortisol and adrenaline into the blood stream.
sentences.chinese: 肾上腺分泌大量的皮质醇和肾上腺素进入血液。

sentences.english: They believe it is associated with the closely related neurotransmitter norepinephrine.
sentences.chinese: 他们相信这与正肾上腺素和神经传递素密切相关。

sentences.english: Epinephrine is critical to rapidly improve the course of anaphylaxis.
sentences.chinese: 肾上腺素能够快速紧急改善速发型过敏反应过程。

sentences.english: But I also felt a buzz of adrenalin.
sentences.chinese: 但我也感觉到肾上腺素迅速分泌的兴奋。

sentences.english: Noradrenalin regulates energy levels, helping you to get up in the morning and sleep at night.
sentences.chinese: 降肾上腺素调节精力，使你能够在晚上入睡早晨醒来。

sentences.english: The effect of adenosine is blocked by adrenergic receptor blockers.
sentences.chinese: 肾上腺素受体阻断剂部分或全部阻断腺苷的作用。

sentences.english: The addition of epinephrine to local anesthetic solutions produces vasoconstriction.
sentences.chinese: 局麻药溶液中加入肾上腺素，使血管收缩。

sentences.english: Results The effects of noradrenaline on renal perfusion was various.
sentences.chinese: 结果去甲肾上腺素对肾脏血流影响存在多样性。

sentences.english: Adrenaline flows and that's what you live on.
sentences.chinese: 肾上腺素在你体内流动，你就依靠它挺了过来。

sentences.english: But for some people merely imagining this scene creates an adrenaline surge.
sentences.chinese: 但是对于某些人但是想象这一幕就会肾上腺素激增。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the effect and mechanisms of breviscapine on hyperglycemia induced by adrenaline in mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察灯盏花素对肾上腺素性高血糖的作用及机制。

sentences.english: The epinephrine injection may be applied through clothing.
sentences.chinese: 肾上腺素可以隔着衣服注射。

definition: testosterone/also written 睾甾酮[gao1 zai1 tong2]
